archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Warehouse Control System [WCS]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Warehouse Control system for the Swindon warehouse. Manages the pick, pack and dispatch activities as well as managing receipts, storage and stock location.
WCS is an implementation of JDA Dispatcher, used for putting away incoming stock, relocating stock, creating pick lists and dispatch labels. The WCS version is currently at 5.2.1.21.0. WCS is a Client - Server application. The desktop client exists on either the RDT scanners or on desktop PCs. The RDT scanners use a telnet application to connect to the WCS server.
This application is hosted in POL Swindon and managed by CSC who manage contract with JDA as application software provider/primary application support. Receives order details from Galaxy and sends instructions to the warehouse automation system (CAPRICORN) via PC based PLC (Paris) to prepare the shipments. Once loaded details of the actual shipments and then confirmed to Galaxy. Also tracks goods inwards. Tracks stock locations within the warehouse.
